dct_title_s: Topographic map of Glacier National Park, Montana
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by spot heights and contours. Contour interval 100 feet.; George Otis Smith, Director USGS. R.B. Marshall, Chief Geographer; Sledge Tatum, Geographer in Charge; topography by H.L. Baldwin Jr., R.H. Chapman, R.H. Sargent, F.E. Matthes, R.T. Evans, S.T. Penick, Arthur Stiles, W.J. Foster, C.C. Holder, Lee Morrison, F.L. Whaley and General Land Office. Surveyed in 1900-1904 and 1907-1912.
